title: BACnetCloseClientCustomer (Function)
text:
FUNCTION BACnetCloseClientCustomer :
IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Closes an advanced BACnet client customer handle.
The user application should call this API function to release all ressources of the
advanced BACnet client API.

rows.Name: hCustomer
rows.Comment:
An handle to an created advanced BACnet client customer
created by BACnetOpenClientCustomer.
